resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

userId.name: userId
userId.description: This value is the same as the User ID that was provided when the analysis was created. Currently only supported for profiles created using LinkedIn URL.
userId.ai_hint: This value is the same as the User ID that was provided when the analysis was created. Currently only supported for profiles created using LinkedIn URL.

sendResume.name: sendResume
sendResume.description: Whether to send a resume for a resume of the user

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.hint: The name of the input binary field containing the resume in PDF or DOCX format

options.name: options
persona
options.description: Fetch the Humantic profile of the user for a particular persona type. Multiple persona values can be supported using comma as a delimiter.

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

text.name: text
text.description: Additional text written by the user
text.ai_hint: Additional text written by the user

conditional_rules: IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'profile' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'profile' THEN SHOW parameter 'sendResume'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'profile' AND sendResume == True THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'profile' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'profile' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'profile' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'profile' THEN SHOW parameter 'sendResume'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'profile' AND sendResume == False THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'profile' AND sendResume == True THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
